trans-unit.source: Represents the options that can be set on an <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter" />.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter> is used to generate code from XML schema using the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] CodeDOM.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter> é usado para gerar o código de esquema XML usando o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] CodeDOM.

trans-unit.source: To generate an XML schema from an assembly, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar um esquema XML de um assembly, use o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about importing and exporting schemas, see [Schema Import and Export](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/schema-import-and-export.md) and [Importing Schema to Generate Classes](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/importing-schema-to-generate-classes.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a importação e exportação de esquemas, consulte [esquema de importação e exportação](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/schema-import-and-export.md) e [Importando esquema para gerar Classes](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/importing-schema-to-generate-classes.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ImportOptions> class and sets the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ImportOptions.EnableDataBinding%2A> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ImportOptions.GenerateInternal%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria uma instância do <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ImportOptions> classe e define o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ImportOptions.EnableDataBinding%2A> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ImportOptions.GenerateInternal%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ImportOptions" /> class.
Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> instance that provides the means to check whether particular options for a target language are supported.
A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> that provides the means to check whether particular options for a target language are supported.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> que fornece os meios para verificar se as opções específicas para um idioma de destino com suporte.

trans-unit.source: To support better code generation for different languages, information about what is supported by the target language needs to be passed to the schema importer.
trans-unit.target: Para dar suporte à geração de código melhor para diferentes idiomas, informações sobre o que há suporte para o idioma de destino devem ser passado para o importador do esquema.

trans-unit.source: This is done by passing an instance of the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> class, which provides a <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.Supports%2A> method to check whether it supports particular <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGeneratorOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Isso é feito, passando uma instância do <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> classe, que fornece um <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.Supports%2A> método para verificar se ele dá suporte a determinado <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGeneratorOptions>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a data contract surrogate that can be used to modify the code generated during an import operation.
An implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate" /> interface that handles schema import.
trans-unit.target: Uma implementação de <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate" /> interface que manipula a importação de esquema.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether types in generated code should implement the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged" /> interface.
<see langword="true" /> if the generated code should implement the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged" /> interface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o código gerado deve implementar o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged" /> interface; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This interface is used by [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] components, such as Windows Forms or Windows Presentation Foundation, to capture data changes for user interface updates.
trans-unit.target: Essa interface é usada pelo [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] componentes, como formulários do Windows ou Windows Presentation Foundation, para capturar as alterações de dados para atualizações de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: The generated properties raise a property-changed event when the value changes, allowing UI hooks to act accordingly.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades geradas disparar um evento de propriedade alterada quando o valor é alterado, a interface de usuário permitindo que se conecta ao agir de acordo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether generated code will be marked internal or public.
<see langword="true" /> if the code will be marked <see langword="internal" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o código será marcada como <see langword="internal" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether generated data contract classes will be marked with the <see cref="T:System.SerializableAttribute" /> attribute in addition to the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute" /> attribute.
<see langword="true" /> to generate classes with the <see cref="T:System.SerializableAttribute" /> applied; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para gerar classes com o <see cref="T:System.SerializableAttribute" /> aplicado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether all XML schema types, even those that do not conform to a data contract schema, will be imported.
<see langword="true" /> to import all schema types; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Para importar todos os tipos de esquema; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Normally, importing a type that does not conform to a valid data contract schema will fail.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, haverá falha na importação de um tipo que não está de acordo com um esquema de contrato de dados válido.

trans-unit.source: However, when this property is set to `true`, all such types will be imported as types that implement the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, quando essa propriedade é definida como `true`, todos os tipos serão importados como tipos que implementam o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary that contains the mapping of data contract namespaces to the CLR namespaces that must be used to generate code during an import operation.
A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> that contains the namespace mappings.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> que contém os mapeamentos de namespace.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of types that represents data contract collections that should be referenced when generating code for collections, such as lists or dictionaries of items.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> that contains the referenced collection types.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> que contém os tipos de coleção referenciada.

trans-unit.source: By default, an array will be generated when importing a collection schema (unless the schema has a special annotation that mentions a different type).
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, será gerada uma matriz ao importar um esquema de coleção (a menos que o esquema tem uma anotação especial que menciona um tipo diferente).

trans-unit.source: However, if there is a matching type in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ImportOptions.ReferencedCollectionTypes%2A> collection, that type will be used.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se houver um tipo correspondente no <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ImportOptions.ReferencedCollectionTypes%2A> coleção, o tipo será usado.

trans-unit.source: For example, when importing schema that contains a list of integers, an array of integers will normally be generated.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, durante a importação de esquema que contém uma lista de inteiros, uma matriz de inteiros normalmente será gerada.

trans-unit.source: However, if the collection contains the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.LinkedList%601> of type integer, that type will be used instead of the array.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se a coleção contiver o <xref:System.Collections.Generic.LinkedList%601> do tipo inteiro, que tipo será usado no lugar da matriz.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> containing types referenced in generated code.
A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> that contains the referenced types.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> que contém os tipos de referência.
